issuesArticle.title: SECURITY: Unauthorized Find My iPhone action or activation lock.
issuesArticle.description: Customer reports that an unauthorized use of Find My [Device] is preventing them from using their device. This can include putting the device in lost mode or just having it locked to an account the customer can not access or doesn’t know, so they can not remove the lock.

issuesArticle.title: !ACCT: SIGNUPS: Additional iCloud signups for device
issuesArticle.description: Customer has used up all three of their account signups on a particular device (for various reasons) and is requesting an additional signup be made available.

issuesArticle.title: !DATA LOSS - iCloud Drive Data Loss - Unknown cause
issuesArticle.description: The customer is missing iCloud Drive documents due to an unknown cause. They did not complete any updates or delete any data to cause this.

solutionsArticle.title: How to back up your iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch
solutionsArticle.description: If you back up your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch, you’ll have a copy of your information to use in case your device is ever replaced, lost, or damaged.

solutionsArticle.title: Restore your iPhone, iPad, or iPod to factory settings
solutionsArticle.description: A factory restore erases the information and settings on your iPhone, iPad, or iPod and installs the latest version of iOS or iPod software.
